metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21127 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Incomplete cleanup in specific special register read operations for some Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-21127` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20220510.0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20220510.0ubuntu1').
